title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
hoosing dialogue 1 will have Halsin explain why he chose such punishment. He thanks you, and asks you to speak to Rath regarding your reward. You will have the following dialogue options.

I hope this grove of yours was worth the bloodshed. What happens next? Leave.

Choosing dialogue 1 will have Halsin tell you how important the grove is to him. This will give you the same dialogue options. Leave and explore the grove.

You can find Zevlor on a stone bridge in Emerald Grove (X:212 Y:458) Speak
